stories.title: Date Picker Functionality
stories.description: As a user, I want to select a date so that I can input date information easily

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When the user views the page, Then a label with text 'Select Date' should be visible
Given the page is loaded, When the user views the page, Then the input with placeholder 'MM/DD/YYYY' should be visible and enabled
Given the date input is visible, When the user clicks on the date input, Then a calendar/date picker UI should be visible

stories.title: Date and Time Display
stories.description: As a user, I want to see the current date and time displayed so that I can have a reference for scheduling

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When the user views the page, Then a label with text 'Date And Time' should be visible
Given the page is loaded, When the user views the page, Then the input showing 'Month Day, Year Time' should display the correct format
